attributes.action: APPROPRIATELY FUNDED NHS USING ONLY NHS EMPLOYED PERSONNEL .
attributes.background:
THE  NHS IS THE GREATEST PIECE OF SOCIAL LEGISLATION EVER.IT'S INCEPTION WAS WHEN BRITAIN WAS FAR LESS PROSPEROUS THAN IT IS TODAY.
A COMBINATION OF BETTER PROCUREMENT.
NON USE OF AGENCY ,BANK AND PRIVATE COMPANIES .
INCREASED TAX AND BETTER TARGETED PUBLIC FINANCE SHOULD MAKE THIS FEASABLE

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
